Question 122) Considering the authorship and lexical selection of this text, as well as the arguments mobilized therein, it is found that the objective of the author of the text is
A) Inform consumers in general about the performance of Conar.
B) Awareness advertisers of the ethical commitment when elaborating its advertising pieces.
C) Alert heads, so that they supervise the content of advertisements published by the media.
D) draw the attention of entrepreneurs and advertisers in general to their responsibilities when hiring advertisers without ethics.
E) draw the attention of companies to the harmful effects they can cause to society, compact with misleading advertisements.
